description.value:
Like pollen on the wind or the roots of plants in the ground, your thoughts permeate your surroundings, allowing you to study and manipulate the world around you.

Phrenic Pool Ability: Charisma

Bonus Spells:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.zkvylzsupqboef0z]{Hide from Animals} (1st),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.yyzf346hiq8ixt0u]{Hold Animal} (4th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.io2yjhr42chvcfb4]{Dominate Animal} (6th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wi9uvm8p12qvq616]{Command Plants} (8th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.h9qiwo9kx8d1hqrn]{Awaken} (10th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ed0epy1pofukpgm6]{Liveoak} (12th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.glt6uk3n6g6l2p6l]{Scrying, Greater} (14th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.szzwom7utm3sm15z]{Control Plants} (16th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.66s5qm8kwycgobce]{Dominate Monster} (18th).
